title.full: Siege King The Siege of Aurum
title.reduced: Siege King The Siege of Aurum

description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Siege King is a four player cooperative top-down action adventure game with four classes, potions, bombs and treasure! It also includes a four player arena mode with free-for-all and team options. Sign on to your Xbox and lay siege the city of Aurum!
description.short: Siege King is a four player cooperative top-down action adventure game with four classes, potions, bombs and treasure! It also includes a four player arena mode with free-for-all and team options. Sign on to your Xbox and lay siege the city of Aurum!
